summary: MY TOWN AND COUNTRY SPEEDS UP AUTOMATICALLY ON OCCASION. I FEEL THE ACCELERATOR DROP DOWN FROM MY FOOT. THE CRUISE CONTROL IS NOT ON, I NEVER USE IT. IT IS DO BAD I I AM LOOKING FOR PLACES TO RUN THE CAR OFF OF THE ROAD IF NECESSARY. I HAVE HAD MY CAR INTO THE DEALERSHIP TWICE AND WAS TREATED LIKE A DUMB WOMAN AND TOLD THAT IT CAN NOT HAPPEN. I HAVE LESS THEN 30,000 MILES ON IT.
